gw.pl.util.webservices

Class Globals

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.pl.util.webservices.Globals

  • public class Globals
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains constant values used throughout the SOAP API implementation.

      static void setDefaultEntityExpansionLimit()
      This method sets the property "entityExpansionLimit" to 10M if it hasn't already been set.

      • getServerApiUrl

        public static java.lang.String getServerApiUrl(java.lang.String serverUrl,
                               java.lang.String apiName)
        Given a Guidewire server URL and the name a SOAP api, return a URL for a web service implementing the given api
        Parameters:
        serverUrl - URL of the remote Guidewire server
        apiName - Name of SOAP api
        Returns:
        URL for remote service implementing the given web service
